Title: MouseExtender - launcher for Windows
Description:
MouseExtender utility is a desktop launcher or shell improvement.
MouseExtender is a easy and quick way run applications and open files from single toolbar-like window.  Download launcher now.
Related programs: launchy, enso,  application launcher, stardocks, 8start
HomeWiki:
Mouse Extender 1.9.9.3

What is it?

MouseExtender is a cosy utility with shortcuts to programs, folders and system functions (Control panel, Restart and Shutdown).
This program allows you to improve your productivity. It is extremely simple and fully customizable.
Detailed description of all features you can find here.
Release details and new features you can find here

System Requirements

Mouse Extender is based on WPF and requires .NET Framework 3.5 SP1
One can check installed version of .NET and minimal installation that he needs here Smallest .NET
If you want ME to support other versions, please contact development team here.
Minimal requirements on hardware:
  • CPU: 1.6 Ghz
  • Graphics: 64 MB of video memory
  • HDD: 1 MB
  • RAM: 50 MB
If you face rendering problems in Mouse Extender and have NVidia graphics, we suggest installing latest drivers
